div.span: Example of “transport”in u_t-u_x = 0 (that is, \alpha = 1) where the initial condition f(x) is a peak at the origin. On the left is a graph of the initial condition u(x,0). On the right is a graph of the function u(x,1), that is at time t=1. Notice it is the same graph shifted one unit to the right.
